encyclopedia.content: —n. 1. approval or sanction: The program for supporting the arts won the government's endorsement. 2. the placing of one's signature, instructions, etc., on a document. 3. the signature, instructions, etc., placed on the reverse of a commercial document, for the purpose of assigning the interest therein to another. 4. a clause under which the stated coverage of an insurance policy may be altered.

entry.def: An endorsement is a statement or action which shows that you support or approve of something or someone.

example.ex: That adds up to an endorsement of the status quo...
This is a powerful endorsement for his softer style of government.
example.tran: 这是对他较温和的执政风格强有力的支持。

entry.def: An endorsement is a note on someone's driving licence saying that they have been found guilty of a driving offence.

entry.tran: (对产品、公司的)广告宣传，支持
entry.def: An endorsement for a product or company involves appearing in advertisements for it or showing support for it.

means.word_mean: 1. a promotional statement (as found on the dust jackets of books);

sentences.sentence: "the author got all his friends to write blurbs for his book"
"a Democrat usually gets the union's endorsement"
"the cashier would not cash the check without an endorsement"
"a star athlete can make a lot of money from endorsements"

Sentence.sentence: This case gives the court an opportunity to rein in the growing use of patents to protect genetically engineered crops and other life forms―but the court may well use it to give this trend a powerful new endorsement.

sentences.en: His presidential campaign won endorsement from several celebrities.
sentences.cn: 他参加总统竞选得到一些社会名流的支持。

sentences.en: The new design only received a lukewarm endorsement from head office.
sentences.cn: 新设计在总部反响平平。

sentences.en: These measures have the strong endorsement of the Labour party.
sentences.cn: 这些措施得到了工党的大力支持。

sentences.en: They are now seeking endorsement for their ideas.
sentences.cn: 他们正在为他们的构想寻求支持。

sentences.en: We are happy to give the product our full endorsement.
sentences.cn: 我们很高兴给予该产品完全的认可。
